ARABIC: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then when they had provoked Our wrath, We took revenge on them and drowned every one of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But when they roused Our anger We inflicted retributive punishment and drowned them all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So when they incurred Our wrath, We exacted retribution from them, and drowned them all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We took revenge on them by drowning them all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when they made Us wrathful, We took revenge from them – We therefore drowned all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So when they angered Us, We punished them, and drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then when they displeased Us, We inflicted a retribution on them, so We drowned them all together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So, when they had angered Us, We took vengeance on them, and We drowned them all together;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So, when they angered Us, We punished them and drowned them every one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then when they provoked Our wrath, We took revenge on them and drowned every one of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So when they vexed Us, We took vengeance on them, and We drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when they roused Our wrath, We took vengeance on them and drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When at length they provoked Us, We exacted retribution from them, and We drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So when they angered Us, We punished them, and drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when they angered Us, We took vengeance on them and drowned all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when they provoked Our wrath, We took retribution from them, and We drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:55] So when they had angered Us, We took vengeance on them and drowned them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So, when they angered Us) when they angered Our Prophet Moses, and tended to anger Us, (We punished them and drowned them every one) in the sea.
